description: Try our easy to follow Pudding Layer Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pudding Layer Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slice pudding horizontally into three pieces.
Whip the cream and sugar until stiff peaks form

Spread one slice of pudding with onethird of the cream and scatter with one-third each of the cherries and flaked chocolate. Top with the second slice of pudding and spread with one third of the cream and scatter with one-third each of the cherries and flaked chocolate. Repeat with the remaining ingredients. Serve immediately.
